channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one case of stripper (un1760) damaging 3 of the inner poly 1 gallon bottles and releasing 2.5 gallons of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report X-2023060218
item.description:
Report X-2023060218

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-07T18:12:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-22
  • City: ASHLAND
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: There was an package found on the vanline leaking , after inspection there was a small penny hole punctured in the side of the pail. DescribePack: There was 1 liter that leak from the drum. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was put inside hazmat tote and brought over to hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023060176
item.description:
Report X-2023060176

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-07T18:12:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-04
  • City: ASHLAND
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During the drivers route the package was knocked over by another package causing one of the container closures to burst open and leak through packaging during transport. Upon receiving the package back at 233 station QA pulled the package off the truck and moved it to the Hazmat damage area for processing. DescribePack: One of the bottle caps burst open allowing liquid to pour out. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed up right and bottle was placed upright as well and the package was placed in a Hazmat container.

item.title: Report X-2023051214
item.description:
Report X-2023051214

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-07T18:12:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-21
  • City: CHANTILLY
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived at station at 6:30 Leaking in trailer 821960 from Hagerstown hub. Our sort manager put it in plastic bin until QA arrived. DescribePack: One of the bottles had a loose lid. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed upright in a plastic bin.

item.title: Report X-2023051195
item.description:
Report X-2023051195

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-07T18:12:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-19
  • City: BLACKSTONE
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found on by qa and was taken to the cage. Upon inspection it was found that one of the four bottles of glass had been broken while in transit. Because of this fact we have removed the undamaged ones. DescribePack: The package is soggy due to the contents of the hazmat leaking out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was found on by qa and was taken to the cage and removed the undamaged ones.

item.title: Report X-2023050544
item.description:
Report X-2023050544

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-07T18:12:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-09
  • City: MANASSAS
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: While unloading trailer 830380 at Bay Door 7, a package handler noticed a package leakage and called over QA in which it was discovered that the package was a hazmat in which it was brought to the cage and put into a sterile drum with absorbent padding. This happened in the time area of 7:30 am. DescribePack: The top of the packaging box completely wet. 3 of the 4 caps were loose on the items. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The chemical was placed in hazmat bag
